item.title: Video Editor with Premiere Pro, Meta AdsManager, and Shopify Experience - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who can translate text into engaging and captivating ads using Premiere Pro. The ideal candidate should be familiar with creating basic ads, as well as integrating Text-to-Speech (TTS) technology for voiceover narration. Knowledge and experience with Meta Adsmanger and Shopify are essential for seamless integration and optimization of ads across platforms.

Responsibilities:
- Translate text into visually appealing ads using Premiere Pro
- Enhance ads with engaging visuals and animations
- Integrate TTS technology for voiceover narration
- Ensure seamless integration of ads across Meta Adsmanger and Shopify

Requirements:
- Proficient in Premiere Pro with proven experience in video editing
- Familiarity with creating basic ads and optimizing them for different platforms
- Knowledge of TTS technology and ability to use it effectively in ads
- Experience with Meta Adsmanger and Shopify for ad integration and optimization

If you are creative, detail-oriented, and have a passion for producing high-quality ads, we would love to hear from you. Please provide examples of your previous work.


Posted On: June 19, 2024 15:07 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Facebook Ad Campaign, Shopify Templates
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Facebook Ad Campaign, Shopify Templates
Country: Belgium

item.title: Looking for a skilled Video editor for our Youtube Cashcow channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for an experienced Video Editor for our YouTube channels through the Cashcow/Faceless method.

Have the following skillset:

- You are committed to high quality without the need for lots of revisions.
- You have a sense of humor
- You understand how to keep viewers engaged with good pacing, transitions etc. - You have experience working under tight deadlines
- You are organized, communicative and has fast turnaround times.
- You can deliver items via (Google Drive/Monday.com/Trello)


Video requirements:
- Video workflow: 10 second bait intro, channel intro and then keep the content in the body edited in a way that is funny, engaging and entertaining. Ending with channel end screens.
- Add in copyright free sound effects/background music where applicable, not in excess.
- Minimal to NO use of stock footage
- Source and use copyright free clips and have stock footage access to use licensed clips. - Edit the video in a bingeable type style that is captivating to the audience, CTR and retention rate focused, 1080p HD+, make use of lower-thirds/text/transitions where applicable. Professional video editing software only - Adobe Premiere Pro, Davinci Resolve or Final Cut Pro.


Job requirements:

We are looking for a Video Editor for the longer term.
We want 8min+ videos
$20 per video

Budget is $20 per video.

We are looking for team members to work on the long run. Respectful communication is essential and is highly valuated. We are prepared to give bonuses to the team when the business goes well. If you share the same values and are looking to work in this team, please don't hesitate to contact us.

Please make sure to send your current portfolio/sample work for review to see if we match.
If you don't add your portfolio we will delete your apply immediately. Our time is valuable and so is yours. So please make sure to include your portfolio!
Also, don't forget to tell us something about yourself, hobby's, who you are, etc.

We look forward to see your work and meet you!


Budget: $250
Posted On: June 19, 2024 15:07 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Videography, Explainer Video, Audio Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Videography, Explainer Video, Audio Editing
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Looking for a FRENCH Translator! - Upwork
item.description:
Hi!

PLEASE ONLY APPLY IF YOU ARE FLUENT IN ENGLISH & FRENCH LANGUAGES.

We need someone that can copy-paste translate our YouTube scripts + translate the titles to 3 of our YouTube channels for each video, and generate new audio files with Elevenlabs!

We need someone that has a basic to advance skill in video editing.

You need to make sure that the titles sounds good and native in the languages you translate to so they can perform well! The translated audio files also need to sound good so people in other languages can enjoy them 🙌

We are using YouTubes new feature and want to expand to multiple languages to get bigger reach

There will be about 15-20 titles & scripts per week that needs to be translated into all of these 4 languages

You will be using Google translate or ChatGPT for translation and
Elevenlabs to generate the audio files, we also need you to cut up the files so they match the video length!

IMPORTANT:
It's great if you can use audio or editing programs to adjust the length of the generations of AI text to speech. It needs to match the length of the videos on YouTube to be compatible!

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 19, 2024 14:49 UTC
Category: Manual Transcription
Skills:English, French, Translation, Video Editing
Skills: English, French, Translation, Video Editing
Country: Sweden
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Facebook and Instagram Ads - Upwork
item.description:
Our completely remote agency specialises in paid ads for different niches. We are currently looking for an experienced Video Editor that speaks German and works with Adobe premiere pro.

You will be the teams expert for all of our video ad creatives. After defining a strategy for our customer, you will create the video ad creatives. That includes edit the raw videos, deciding which texts to use and finding a design that matches with the customer's corporate identity. We aspire to find a freelancer that is interested in a longer term business relationship and who wants to have an impact.

The main task is creating video ad creatives with Adobe premiere pro. As we only have German-speaking customers, you have to be able to speak and write in German. Depending on your strengths and preferences, we are also open to discuss additional responsibilities.

Sounds interesting? Reach out to us!

We are looking forward to your message.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 14:50 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Promotional Video, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial
Skills: Promotional Video, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial
Country: Switzerland

item.title: Social Media Content Filming, Editing, and Posting. (NYC Local) - Upwork
item.description:
*Note: MUST be based in New York City*

We are seeking a talented individual to film social media content, edit the footage, and post it to our Instagram account. The ideal candidate should be based in New York City, preferably near the East Village area. This is a great opportunity to showcase your video/photo skills and social media knowledge.

The content will focus on a new magic show we are building in a space in the East Village, so interviewing the magician, and documenting the building process as we raise awareness for the show.

As part of this role, you will be responsible for capturing high-quality videos, editing them to create engaging content, and ensuring timely posting on our Instagram page. We are looking for someone with a keen eye for detail, strong video editing skills, and a good understanding of social media trends and aesthetics.

Skills required:
- Video recording for social media
- Video editing (instagram/tiktok/YouTube)
- Social media management
- Attention to detail
- Understanding Aesthetics

Preferred background
-Interest in live events
-Interest in theater or magic shows
-Creative background
-Ability to self manage

Hourly Range: $15.00-$28.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 14:49 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Instagram, Social Media Content Creation, Photo Editing, Photography
Skills: Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Content, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Instagram, Social Media Content Creation, Photo Editing, Photography
Country: United States

item.title: Videographer available in Barcelona 6-9 September 2024 - Upwork
item.description:
We are participating in a medical congress in Barcelona from 6 to 9 (included) September. We need a videographer (or cameraman or video-maker) available in Barcelona from September 6 to September 9 from 9am to 5pm every day.

Tasks will be:
- shooting video-interviews (example: https://youtu.be/oW7K3FEL1Ic?si=Nq784K8l-fIfjOsn)
- b-roll of congress and booths
- possible video coverage of events, b-roll

At the moment, we are planning to do the video post-production editing internally, but perhaps we can work with you. This to be decided after the congress.

You will come fully equipped to shoot the whole interviews (camera, microphones, tripos, gimbal [nice-to-have]... )

Please provide a quote that will cover the whole day of shooting from 9am to 5pm - the quote will be for 3 to 4 days.

Thank you in advance

(it is possible that the job will be required also on 20-21 September in another congress in Barcelona)


Hourly Range: $15.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 14:42 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Testimonial Video, Camera Operation, Video Production
Skills: Testimonial Video, Camera Operation, Video Production
Country: France
click to apply

item.title: Long Term YouTube Video Editor Needed for News Style Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Hi! Thanks for checking out my job post! I’m looking for a long term expert video editor for a news style YouTube channel. Script and Voiceover will be provided. Videos need to be highly engaging and have high quality editing, with experience sourcing and clipping “live” copyright safe clips and use of majority real life images/video clips, not just from stock. On average videos will range from 5-10 mins. This will multiple videos a week. (3-5) Payment will be per project. The videos will be covering current/trending topics so very fast turnaround is needed. Looking for a very fast 24 hour or less turnaround time. Budget is $50/video, but is negotiable for the right skills. Bonuses will be provided for performance of videos. Please see examples of the styles I’m looking to incorporate, but exceed in quality in the video editing below:
Donald Trump And MAGA LEFT In TEARS after Jimmy Kimmel EXPOSED Him
https://youtu.be/FcX2JDjENpg?si=LcucV0K2B8GBeQMC

At Texas Again! Trump COLLAPSE At Rally After MAGA fans BOOED him BLACKS OUT during speech Minnesota
https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=HRTx7a6kb2o

If you’re able to edit videos with the above requirements, please apply and mention one of the example channel’s name listed in your message.  I look forward to your response. Thanks!

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 19, 2024 14:39 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:DaVinci Resolve, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe Photoshop, Final Cut Pro
Skills: DaVinci Resolve, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe Photoshop, Final Cut Pro
Country: United States

item.title: Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
``Duties:
- Edit video footage to create high-quality and engaging content
- Collaborate with the creative team to understand project requirements and objectives
- Trim footage segments and put together the sequence of the film
- Input music, dialogues, graphics, and effects
- Ensure logical sequencing and smooth running of the final product
- Continuously discover and implement new editing technologies and industry's best practices to maximize efficiency ```Requirements:```
- Proven work experience as a Video Editor or similar role - Proficient in using film editing software such as Adobe Premiere, Adobe After Effects, and Adobe Creative Suite
- Familiarity with other editing software like Adobe Bridge, Capture One, and Maya is a plus
- Solid experience with digital technology and editing software packages
- Strong understanding of post-production techniques including color grading, audio mixing, and typography
- Excellent attention to detail with a creative mind and storytelling skills
- Ability to work independently as well as collaborate effectively with a team
- Strong time management skills to meet project deadlines If you are passionate about video editing and have the skills to bring stories to life through visual content, we would love to hear from you. Join our team of talented professionals and contribute to creating compelling videos that captivate audiences.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$12.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 14:36 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Video Editing
Skills: Social Media Video, Video Editing
Country: United States

item.title: Video Editor for YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We run several YouTube Automation channels, also known as "Cash Cow channels", and we're looking for a video editor.

Our videos usually are 8-12 minutes long. We will pay $10 per video, with the possibility of renewal of the contract once the first 5 videos are completed.

The process will go like this: we will send you the script, the narration, the footage to download, and clear step-by-step instructions with everything you need to know about the topic and how to make the video so that you can edit without any problem or doubt.

You will download footage for that topic, you will add it together with the narration, songs, texts, and transitions, and create a video. Then, you will send the finished video to us within 2 days of receiving the instructions.

If you're interested, include some samples of your past work so we can decide if you're a good fit. If your sample is good, we will send you the first trial video with a script, voiceover, and footage for you to edit.

IF YOU'RE NOT OKAY WITH ANY OF THE GUIDELINES SPECIFIED ABOVE, OR THE PAYMENT, OR THE DELIVERY TIME, DO NOT APPLY OR YOU WILL BE BLOCKED.

Budget: $50
Posted On: June 19, 2024 14:19 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video, YouTube Development
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Explainer Video, YouTube Development
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply

item.title: Create 54 video variants from one main video, in After Effects - Upwork
item.description:
We have made a UGC Video. Your objective is to recreate multiple variants of this example video using the provided video material. We need a variant of the example videos for each game, each UGC Hook, and each aspect ratio.

This will be 54 videos in total (6 games x 3 aspect ratios x 3 hooks).

We already finished a reference video (Hook 1/2/3) (aspect ratio 1:1), for your reference.

See the attachments for the exact briefing.
If performed well, there will be lots of similar projects in the future.

item.title: Work Reel Motion Design - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking to create a work reel for our agency. I'd like to showcase our work in brand identity design, UX, video, and lead gen.

I want the reel to be energizing and exciting, presenting our work in an interesting way using motion design.

The example I like is this one: https://vimeo.com/340053018

We will provide access to our working files and final files. There is no set length of the video. This will be used on our website, social media, and YouTube.


Posted On: June 19, 2024 14:13 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
